title: Adjust Bus Headways Based on Real-Time Demand
description: Passenger demand on a certain route is higher than usual. An operator increases bus frequency to reduce wait times.

tasks.description: Receive an alert that passenger wait times on 'Route 12' are exceeding the 15-minute target.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the service level alert.

tasks.description: Instruct the drivers on 'Route 12' to decrease their headway (time between buses) from 15 minutes to 10 minutes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the new operational instruction to the drivers.

tasks.description: Monitor the route's wait times to confirm they drop to the new, lower target.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the operational change had the desired effect.
